setTimeout(()=>{setShowOTPModal(false);setOtpCode('');setOtpMessage('');onLogin(data.user);},1500);}else{setOtpMessage(data.message||'Invalid verification code');}}catch(error){console.error('Error verifying OTP:',error);setOtpMessage('Network error.
